title: Bug in ColorPicker Control Programatically Changing Alpha
body:
With the ColorPicker control (thanks for adding this, btw!) there is a bug when changing alpha channel programmatically. Create a new ColorPicker with Alpha enabled in the UI and a ColorChanged event handler.
(1) Set .Color to a transparent color #00000000.
(2) Then, in a color changed event handler change to 0xFFxxxxxx (100% opacity). It's important to change the alpha similar to:
